product_summary: Letterly is a mobile app that uses AI to convert speech to well-written text. It's faster than typing, and it can be used to capture ideas, write messages, create social posts, and more.
product_pros: Can be used in any language
Offers a variety of rewriting options
Can be used to capture ideas, write messages, create social posts, and more
product_cons: May not be as accurate as human transcription
Can be difficult to use in noisy environments
May not be suitable for all types of writing
Could be improved by adding more advanced features
Free tier may be too limited for some users

product_usecases.details: Don’t forget anything, record even when it's inconvenient to type
There's no need to delay sending when it’s quick and easy
Never let a great idea slip away – capture it with its details
Send clear emails by voice, x3 faster than typing

product_toolfor.details: Can be used to quickly capture ideas and generate content
Can be used to take notes in class or record lectures
Can be used to quickly send emails, create presentations, and more
Can be used to communicate with others who may not be able to hear or see

product_toolfor.target: Anyone who wants to save time and improve their writing
product_toolfor.details: Can be used to quickly and easily create high-quality written content

product_pricing: Free tier available, with paid plans starting at $4.99/month
